columns.name: cust_subscription_id
columns.description: The name of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

columns.name: customer_aws_id
columns.description: The AWS customer account associated with the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

columns.name: enabled
columns.description: A boolean value indicating whether the subscription is enabled or disabled

columns.name: severity
columns.description: The event severity specified in the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

columns.name: sns_topic_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SNS topic used by the event notification subscription.

columns.name: source_type
columns.description: The source type of the events returned by the Amazon Redshift event notification.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

columns.name: subscription_creation_time
columns.description: The date and time the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription was created.

columns.name: event_categories_list
columns.description: The list of Amazon Redshift event categories specified in the event notification subscription.

columns.name: source_ids_list
columns.description: A list of the sources that publish events to the Amazon Redshift event notification subscription.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the event subscription.
